{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Hughes |model=RE2000 |fcc_date=05/08/2017 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Arcadyan |type=range extender |fcc_id=RAXWE410443 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=MediaTek |cpu1_model=MT7621AT;MEDIATEK, MT7621AT, 1634-AMTH, CTPA9A64, DTPAWB50; |cpu1_cspeed=880 |cpu1_cores=2 |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5CC64M16GP-DIR |wi1_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi1_chip1_model=MT7615N;MEDIATEK, ARM, MT7615N, 1634-BFSL, ACMSWLYL; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=4 |wi1_rxchains=4 |wi1_sstreams=4 |wi2_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi2_chip1_model=MT7615N;MEDIATEK, ARM, MT7615N, 1634-BFSL, ACMSWLYL; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=4 |wi2_rxchains=4 |wi2_sstreams=4 |eth_cpu=true |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=1 |flags=Wave2, MU-MIMO, DFS (master), 256QAM, |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=HUGHES_2.4G_XXXXX, HUGHES_5G_XXXXX |default_pass=admin }}
:• '''1733Mbps''' - 4SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan.), :• '''800Mbps''' - 4SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan., 256QAM) = '''''2600 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|Wi-Fi Booster / Wi-Fi Repeater}} :{{ProductPage|http://cloud.mailfromhughes.com/WiFiBooster}} "P/N: 141410420000J R01" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. [https://support.hughesnet.com/faq/internet/what-hughes-wi-fi-booster ''What is the Hughes Wi-Fi Booster?'' on '''HughesNet.com'''] :"The Hughes Wi-Fi Booster is designed to work only with the [[Hughes HT2000W]] [Satellite] Modem."
